NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
DAZ: Your work impresses me as usual, Cassava. The warp receiver looks wonderful with these beautiful curving walls built around it!
2 1
DAZ: If more warp receivers are constructed in the future, I propose they should be adorned with a similar design to help Nomai easily recognize them!
3 2
CASSAVA: I am glad to hear your approval, my love! It is truly an honor to do what I can to help with this exciting project.
4 3
CASSAVA: Sadly, we will still need to wait for Poke's work to be complete for this warp receiver to actually be functional..
5 4
CASSAVA: If I know her well enough, I fear we may locate the Eye ourselves before she ever completes her work!
6 5
POKE: Should you ever require warp cores for future projects, do not be surprised if you receive the lowest priority, Cassava.
